item.title: À propos de nous / About Us
item.description:
• Bavarder avec nous: installer l’appli Telegram puis devenir membre de notre groupe.
    Chat with us: install the Telegram app then join our group.
  • Pour rejoindre notre liste de diffusion, envoyez un e-mail vierge à parlonslondon+subscribe@groups.io
    To join our mailing list send a blank email to parlonslondon+subscribe@groups.io
  • Rejoignez-nous à notre groupe de Meetup. Join us on our Meetup group.

item.title: Duolingo Update for French Learners
item.description: You may have noticed that our meeting is no longer listed on Duolingo. The meeting is still on, and everyone is welcome to join!

item.title: Resources
item.description: We don’t teach French - we are deliberately a casual group just for conversation - there are no formal lessons or homework and no preparation is required. However here are some helpful links that our members recommend: Learning Duolingo - a website and smartphone app that teachs French and many other languages gradually, for free (or without ads for an annual fee) Memrise - a paid smartphone app that helps learn vocabulary Rosetta Stone - paid software with some similarities to Duolingo Free French course from TV5MONDE Immersion: Watching and Listening Radio-Canada podcasts - practice listening or just immerse yourself in the sounds 239 French Conversations on YouTube Language Learning with Netflix - an extension for the Chrome browser - if you have a Netflix subscription, it will show two sets of subtitles at once News ICI Radio-Canada - Canada’s public broadcasting in French Courrier International - French language news from a variety of sources La Presse - independent, non-profit Québec news organisation Euronews - French edition France 24 - 24-hour international news TV station with a live feed, owned by the French Government (also available on YouTube) Other Groups Duolingo Events has a lot of meetings, including in French
